TopicTitle: We have to go back....to the internet!

Articles.Content: Hello all! I've been without internet since around the middle of May, but I'm finally back! Woot!
Oh wow, how'd you survive? Did Facebook think you died?

Well, welcome back!

I'm likely to be away from the internet for a good chunk of the summer.

Happy landings!

oh, no! you're back. I hoped you were gone forever. Now where's that ban button, I always forget about it....

Jokes apart, welcome back to the fold .
Yay!  Now you can finally update the RGG!
